General.Name: Fulin Plastic Industry Cayman Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Fulin Plastic Industry (Cayman) Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of artificial leather and rubber fabric. The company offers latex, soft, TPU/PU, PVC solid, PVC sponge, and PVC casting leather products; tapes; PVC sheets; tarpaulins; and non-woven fabrics, as well as various embossing products. Its products are used in leather bags, shoes, furniture, vehicle, balls, raincoats, printing sheets, transparent bags, and overlays. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Hai Phong, Vietnam.
General.Address: Km9, Pham Van Dong street, Hai phong, Vietnam
